environment-variables:
"GRAPHQL_API_KEY"="4E66696FFF6F04B16332D4B89E54BE82";"GRAPHQL_CODEGEN_TEMPLATE"="schema:
  - 'https://api.bnbparty.com/graphql':
      headers:
        Authorization: 'Bearer {{apiKey}}'
documents: '{{queriesPath}}'
generates:
  '{{generatedPath}}':
    preset: near-operation-file
    presetConfig:
      extension: .cs
      baseTypesPath: base-types.cs
    plugins:
      - 'c-sharp'
    config:
      namespaceName: GraphQLCodeGen.Generated
      fragmentMasking: true
";
